quotes.quote: It was just that we had this phenomenal honeymoon relationship that just kept on going.
Couples who move in to together should use the opportunity of the honeymoon period to make positive changes to their diet and lifestyle by working together and supporting each other.
Go to a place where you're not going to be stressed, because a honeymoon itself can be a stressful thing.
A honeymoon is a short period of doting between dating and debting.
Short honeymoons are better than no honeymoons, but long honeymoons are best of all.
The honeymoon is not actually over until we cease to stifle our yawns.
My clothes are great for a honeymoon: They're light and sexy, colorful and pretty, and not expensive.

The honeymoon is the unforgettable period in a couple's life. Later in life, tried and tired in the dust and mist of relations, together or not, they would always miss that time they spent together. Every bit of it.
Honeymoons are the beginning of wisdom but the beginning of wisdom is the end of romance.
Your honeymoon tells the world and maybe you who you are.
Honeymoon lasts not nowadays above a fortnight.
Happiness consists of living each day as if it were the first day of your honeymoon and the last day of your vacation.
Our honeymoon will shine our life long: its beams will only fade over your grave or mine.
It was a honeymoon at first, with people feeling like brothers and sisters. It was beautiful.
The honeymoon is the only period when a woman isn't trying to reform her husband.
That honeymoon phase is so much fun in real life, when you meet and discover somebody new and fall in love and chase them. The pursuit. And that climactic final moment of ultimate togetherness.
